name: RunAway (Ashes of a Noob)
description:
In this game player will be playing the role of Dak.  A middle school student who is having issues in his life. 

Everyone has a different way to deal with their emotions and feelings, for Dak this is to imagine himself running from negative emotions such as anger.

Controllers:

Use A and D to move from one track to the other.

Use Space to jump.

Use S to slide under obstacles.

Press and hold W to wall run (hold till Dak reaches the floor).

Github repository: https://github.com/doidexx/RunAway

Credits:

3D models by Shequana Garnet. Narrative by Maurice Edwards. Music by Kyle Lambert & Chris William.
